short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save images to custom locations from the context menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a context menu item for images that immediately saves the file to the Downloads folder (or a subdirectory of Downloads). The filename can be customized based on various placeholders.
